A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I thought that this movie was amazing\, it delved deeper into the force than before\, we got more character development from the \"new\" main characters\, we get to say goodbye to some\, we see a new side to the saga.  This movie gives new life to series in a way that no other movie before has done.  It gives HOPE.  The script is well done\, the action sequences are on point\, and the fight choreography is masterfully done.  All over a great move\, probably the best of the franchise so far.
